game.name: Mummy, mummy, mummy!
game.shortDescription: Mummy, mummy, mummy! - a puzzle platformer game about mummies, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mummy, mummy, mummy! - a puzzle platformer game about mummies, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: This game is broken and the developer abandoned it, even if they fix it it is still a bad game.
Mummy, mummy, mummy! is an asset flip tier 2D retro puzzle platformer built with Unity, from the Russian asset flip scammers/plagiarists, Piece of Vox...
